resources.string: Stops apps from littering in storage.
NoLitter prevents apps from creating folders in SDCard root folder by moving them away. It cleans up the root folder while ensuring that apps still function.

Usually after enabling the module, you don't have to do anything.
Changing configuration requires restarting corresponding app.
1. If an app crashes, fails to access SDCard, or cannot be limited, enable force mode.
2. If it still doesn't work, try cleaning the app's data.
3. If it still doesn't work, NoLitter isn't compatible with the app. Please add it to whitelist if you need the app.
Create separate folder for each app under Android/files
When force mode is enabled, it will be redirected to the redirect directory regardless of whether the directory exists in the root directory
Remove residual files in the redirect directory after the application has been uninstalled
Redirect to the specified directory, which may disable the adaptation of NoLitter for some applications such as Qingzhuo, the default value is /Android/files
You can still open this page from Xposed Installer
When enabled, redirect information will be printed in Xposed Manager
